site_name: Charlesworth House, 48 Stanhope Gardens, LONDON, SW7 5RD
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by Condition 3 (submission of details - a) services for the newly created bathroom in the former cloak room, including means of ventilation; b) details of the proposed replacement jib doors (1:20) for services/plant cupboard; c) details of the proposed replacement kitchen units, including elevation and section drawings (1:20). The kitchen units should be set below any adjacent window cill; d) details of methodology of replacement floor finishes, including retention of any existing/historic floorboards, and samples of any replacement floor finishes) of Listed Building consent LB/24/03768 (Internal alterations including replacement of some internal non-original doors, updating floor and wall finishes; M&E works related to service/plan cupboard; and installation of new kitchen units, power sockets/light switches)
